text: Ware wa ningen ni, ryōshin ni taishite shinsetsu ni suru yō meijita.Daga moshi kare-ra (ryōshin) ga, anata ni taishi nandaka wakaranai mono o ware ni haisuru yō ni shiirunaraba, kare-ra ni shitagatte wa naranai. Anata gata wa (mina) ware no moto ni kaeru. Sonotoki ware wa, anata gata no okonatta koto o tsugerudearou
